(d) National Exercise Program The Secretary shall ensure that the exercise program developed under subsection (a) is a component of the National Exercise Program established under section 748 of this title.
(e) Ferry system exemption This section does not apply to any ferry system for which drills are required to be conducted pursuant to section 70103 of title 46.
